page.title: 03Brookmans Park Village Shops
page.content: There is a small shopping centre in Brookmans Park. We sent out a questionnaire to local people to find out if they used the shops. The survey showed the village used them regularly though most people used a nearby town for their main shopping. Of the follow ing three types of shop_: food, newsagent, non food_ we found that the food shop is the most popular. What people would most like to see in our village is a shoe shop, though there were other suggestions. The parking facilities were found to be satisfactory by most people. Though the shops are used regularly, they are only used for odd items not bought at the supermarket. The village shops are used for convenience shopping as prices tend to be higher in the village than in a supermarket.
